params._config: The configuration of the Hyperdrive pool.
params._extraData: The extra data that contains the ERC4626 vault.
params._salt: The create2 salt used in the deployment.

returns._0: The address of the newly deployed ERC4626Hyperdrive instance.

deploy((address,address,bytes32,uint256,.notice: Deploys a Hyperdrive instance with the given parameters.
